Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory260.png'}
{3: 'Although Nanami cannot tell why the hat-wearing program would try to help her, she has still managed to get rid of the odd-behaving programs, and she races toward the exit of the anomaly.'}
{3: 'Despite being prepared, Nanami still loses her balance from the different sensory inputs of the two areas as she crosses the barrier.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Uwah! Not again?!', 4: '1'}

{3: 'Nanami lands on her face, and her running chainsaw flies from her hand to the side of a group of repair programs. They just mechanically pull the chainsaw out, and then thoroughly repair the cracked floor.'}
{3: "Climbing up, Nanami readjusts her frame's sensory input again before picking up her weapon. She carefully taps the head of one of the programs, and it pays her no attention."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'No reaction at all... I bet only the programs in the anomaly behave so strangely.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She wears the chainsaw on her back and tries to recollect what just happened inside the anomaly.'}

{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's obviously not normal for the programs to develop self-awareness. But for some reason, the repair programs outside would not respond to anything that happens inside the anomaly...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hmm... this is quite troublesome indeed! If the source isn't located, Nanami alone can't stop the anomaly from expanding...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she scratches her head on her predicament, a familiar voice once again pops up in her mind.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'The individual named Nanami! Entry without permission is illegal behavior. Remove yourself from the scene immediately and provide an incident report.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Ah... That... that is...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami cannot come up with a good excuse on the spot, but she remembers that there is something more important she needs to report.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Right, forget that. Nanami has important information to share with mecha babushka!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Nanami's description is all over the place, and it comes with many unnecessary details, but she more or less manages to convey the danger of the anomaly."}
{2: '???', 3: 'Your report is acknowledged. In accordance with the defense protocol, I will now begin scanning the repair program network nodes...', 4: '2'}
{3: "Smugly, Nanami waits for the scan to complete, her head filled with ideas on how to accept mecha babushka's compliments."}
{2: '???', 3: 'Scan result... zero anomaly identified. No bugs detected beyond the scan parameter. Conclusion—repair operation is functioning as intended.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's not possible! You gotta check it again...", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'A correction on my previous conclusion—one anomaly detected.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'See? Nanami told you!', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'An anomaly caused by you, Nanami. Your illegal entry has disrupted the data flow, leading to a 0.04% delay in the repair operation. You must leave now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That can't be! Nanami is here to...", 4: '1'}

{2: '???', 3: 'Cross-referencing the database and your activity log of today, I predict that it is highly likely that you will continue to commit "lying"" and ""civil disruption." I recommend an immediate termination of such behavior.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "No, I didn't do that!", 4: '1'}

{2: '???', 3: 'Another possible lie. Please leave this place immediately. If there is indeed a bug, the repair programs will automatically correct it. We do not require inspection from a sole operative.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Sob... If you're not going to believe Nanami, then fine!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami pulls a face at the empty space before her, then she turns around and stares at the barrier to the anomaly before shaking her head eventually.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It said it's not Nanami's business, so Nanami's out of here!", 4: '1'}
